name: Spooky Chase: Panic in Littletown
description:
A great mystery is haunting the poor Littletown, its up to you to find out what's going on and save the city. 

On Spooky Chase: Panic in Littletown, all the enemies are based on the player's movement! So watch your steps!

Inputs:

 Run - ASWD, Arrow keys 

Jump - Space 

Totem Asset - TAB 

XBOX controller: 

Run: D pad

Jump: A Button
